import React from 'react' import { PromoCard, PromoFooter, PromoImg, PromoTitle } from './style' const PromotionCard = ({promotion}) => ( {promotion.title} R$ {promotion.price} {promotion.comments.length > 0 && (
"{promotion.comments[0].comment}"
)} {promotion.comments.length} Coment√°rios Ir para o site ) export default PromotionCard
